name: Snakey Bridge [Trijam #142]
description:
Made in 3 hours for the Trijam #142 Game Jam.

The theme was : True or false.

I struggled to get ideas for this theme, so I used the 'Randomicon' idea generator on itch.io, and it generated these 3 prompts : 

I decided icon 2 would be the character in the game, icon 3 would be the environment and icon 1 the gameplay element.

----

Overall I'm happy to have something to show for my first time in this game jam, but I'm more looking forward to taking this knowledge and doing much better next time. I would have liked to add animations, more levels etc but I now understand how to manage my time better. Not to mention I forgot to set up the UI scaling properly! Excited to join again and do better next week!
